name: Ext2 File System Driver for Windows NT
short_description:
Ext2 File System Driver for Windows NT with read write access.

This is a project for the development of a Windows File System Driver for the Ext2 file system. 
The Ext2 file system is (was?) the defacto file system for most Linux distributions.
